case.title: Let's Travel~where r u intellectual one - 28 (Downtown)
case.text:
~~~~Hi I am a sweet, friendly , beautiful girl inside and out. I am very attractive w/ an exotic look. I'm 5'5, tone-fit, black hair and well mannered. I am searching for a Caucasian preferred individual who would like a travelling companion. I would like to travel soon within the next two weeks at least for 5 days to 14 days somewhere nice, warm , nature like that will be rejuvenating. U have to b willing to book tix ASAP...
This is an opportunity to see where this can lead; whether it be just being friends or likely to lead into something of value in terms of forming a relationship... Either way. Goes... I will NOT respond BACK to those whom are not taking this serious. I need your PICTURE along with your Number and Description of yourself ...or for beginners. I def Want your pic. Please be btw the ages of (24 to 38). Your pic will receive mines back
